SEARCH
Package org.codehaus.plexus.archiver

Class DotDirectiveArchiveFinalizer

java.lang.Object
org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.AbstractArchiveFinalizer
org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.DotDirectiveArchiveFinalizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ArchiveFinalizer
public class DotDirectiveArchiveFinalizer extends AbstractArchiveFinalizer
An ArchiveFinalizer that process dot files with archiver directives contained within. This basically means you can communicate archive creation instructions between processes using dot files.
Author:
Jason van Zyl
